keyMoments.title: Learns of Ivankov and Inazuma's Defeat
keyMoments.description: Luffy is informed that Emporio Ivankov and Inazuma were defeated by Magellan, causing him to become enraged.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's emotional response to his allies being hurt and his initial desire for revenge.

keyMoments.title: Chooses Escape Over Revenge
keyMoments.description: Despite his rage, Luffy is convinced by Jinbe and Bon Clay to prioritize escaping to save Ace over fighting Magellan.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's character growth and ability to control his emotions for a greater goal.

keyMoments.title: Champion Luffy Armor Created
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 coats Luffy's fists and feet with wax armor, allowing him to fight Magellan without being poisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Gives Luffy the ability to fight Magellan effectively, turning the tables on their previous encounter.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Champion Rifle
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Champion Rifle, his first successful attack against Magellan with the wax armor enhancement.
keyMoments.significance: First time Luffy can damage Magellan without being poisoned.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Champion Bazooka
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his signature two-handed Bazooka attack enhanced with wax armor.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full potential of the Champion Luffy combination.

keyMoments.title: Rematch with Magellan Begins
keyMoments.description: Luffy heads back to confront Magellan for round 2, this time with wax armor protection.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the climactic battle between Luffy and the overwhelming prison warden.

abilities.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Pistol enhanced with Mr. 3's wax armor, allowing him to strike poison users without being affected.
Luffy's two-handed Bazooka attack enhanced with wax armor coating on his fists.

keyMoments.title: Creates Candle Wall Against Magellan
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 discovers that his wax can block Magellan's poison and creates a Candle Wall to protect the escapees.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the key strategy that allows Luffy to fight Magellan. Shows Mr. 3's loyalty and usefulness to the escape plan.
keyMoments.quote: My wax can block his poison!

keyMoments.title: Creates Champion Luffy Armor
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 coats Luffy's fists and feet with wax, creating the Champion Luffy armor that allows Luffy to strike Magellan safely.
keyMoments.significance: Pivotal moment showing the alliance between former enemies. Mr. 3's Devil Fruit becomes crucial to the escape.
keyMoments.quote: I'll coat your fists and feet with wax so you can hit Magellan!

abilities.description: Mr. 3 can coat others with his wax to create protective armor, as demonstrated when he creates the Champion Luffy armor.

relationships.description: Mr. 3 helps Luffy fight Magellan by creating wax armor, forming an unlikely alliance during the prison break.

evolutionMoments.description: Mr. 3 creates the Champion Luffy armor, enabling Luffy to fight Magellan.

reveals.information: Mr. 3's wax can resist Magellan's poison

keyMoments.title: Convinces Luffy to Prioritize Escape
keyMoments.description: Jinbe reminds Luffy that they only have 4.5 hours to save Ace and convinces him to focus on escape rather than revenge.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jinbe's leadership and strategic thinking, keeping the group focused on their ultimate goal.
keyMoments.quote: We have four and a half hours remaining until Ace's execution!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Mizugokoro
keyMoments.description: Jinbe demonstrates Fish-Man Jujutsu: Mizugokoro, physically manipulating water currents by creating a glowing orb of water.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Fish-Man Jujutsu abilities (distinct from Fish-Man Karate), showcasing Jinbe's mastery.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Kairyu Ipponzeoi
keyMoments.description: Jinbe uses Kairyu Ipponzeoi to launch a door carrying Buggy, Crocodile, and Mr. 1 onto a Marine battleship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's incredible power and provides the solution to the escape plan when all seemed lost.

keyMoments.title: Uses Spear Wave from Distance
keyMoments.description: Jinbe uses Fish-Man Karate: Uchimizu to pierce through the Marine battleship from a great distance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jinbe's long-range capabilities and his concern for his allies.

abilities.description: A Fish-Man Jujutsu technique that allows Jinbe to physically grab and manipulate water currents, creating a glowing orb of water.
Following Mizugokoro, Jinbe heaves the current upward to erupt from the ocean surface as a towering stream, capable of launching objects great distances.
A Fish-Man Karate technique that fires a water projectile capable of piercing through ships.

reveals.information: Jinbe can use Fish-Man Jujutsu to manipulate water currents

keyMoments.title: Orders Marine Ships Relocated
keyMoments.description: Magellan executes his clever scheme by ordering all Marine battleships to move away from Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's tactical intelligence beyond his overwhelming power. Nearly foils the entire escape plan.
keyMoments.quote: Move all battleships away from Impel Down immediately!

keyMoments.title: Confronts Luffy for Round 2
keyMoments.description: Magellan faces Luffy again, this time with Luffy protected by Mr. 3's wax armor.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the climactic rematch between the two, with Luffy now having a fighting chance.

keyMoments.title: Ominous Warning to Luffy
keyMoments.description: Magellan asks if Luffy remembers their last battle and warns 'Then I will not let you forget.'
keyMoments.significance: Creates dramatic tension and emphasizes Magellan's confidence and danger.
keyMoments.quote: Then I will not let you forget.

reveals.information: Magellan is capable of strategic planning beyond direct combat, as shown by his scheme to relocate the Marine ships

keyMoments.title: Helps Convince Luffy to Escape
keyMoments.description: Bon Clay works with Jinbe to convince Luffy to prioritize escaping over fighting Magellan.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Bon Clay's loyalty to Luffy and his understanding of the mission's importance.
